item.title: A Vim Primer
item.description: This one’s for my IDE friends that can’t exit Vim. What is Vim? Vim (Vi-iMproved) is a free and open-source text editor. That’s it, really! Why Vim? I’m glad you asked, here’s the short version: Vim is extendable: Vim has a billion add-ons, everything from code completion to LateX previewers are available. You can contribute yourself if you want to write custom plugins, but the point here is that Vim has a massive amount of support, which will probably continue because …

item.title: A Quick Intro
item.description: Hello, and welcome. My name is Benson (Ben for short, hard to get coffee otherwise). This is a site where I talk about stuff that I have interest in. Mostly though, you’ll see me write up posts about things I enjoy and don’t. Right now, here’s what I’m planning: A Quick Vim Introduction - per the title, an introduction to the most beloved text editor of all time. The goal is to get you up and running with Vim.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Migrating from Wordpress to Github pages via hugo. Feels pretty good thus far, and I wanted to dust off my old Github home page anyway. Introductory post coming soon, this is just a test. Ben
